    1: from pandas import (
    2:     Index,
    3:     NaT,
    4:     Timedelta,
    5:     TimedeltaIndex,
    6: )
    7: import pandas._testing as tm
    8: 
    9: 
   10: class TestFillNA:
   11:     def test_fillna_timedelta(self):
   12:         # GH#11343
   13:         idx = TimedeltaIndex(["1 day", NaT, "3 day"])
   14: 
   15:         exp = TimedeltaIndex(["1 day", "2 day", "3 day"])
   16:         tm.assert_index_equal(idx.fillna(Timedelta("2 day")), exp)
   17: 
   18:         exp = TimedeltaIndex(["1 day", "3 hour", "3 day"])
   19:         idx.fillna(Timedelta("3 hour"))
   20: 
   21:         exp = Index([Timedelta("1 day"), "x", Timedelta("3 day")], dtype=object)
   22:         tm.assert_index_equal(idx.fillna("x"), exp)
